item.title: Coming up in 2020!
item.description: 2019 and the 2010s are coming to a close! We hope you all enjoy the holiday season in whatever way you do, and we canâ€™t way to see you in the new year. January 14th, 2020: Our fearless leader Thea Knowles is coming back to visit us and to share her rmarkdown and bookdown wisdom with us. This will also be the month that marks 3 awesome years of R-Ladies London, and weâ€™re so thrilled to have her with us to celebrate our birthday ðŸŽ‚!
